about_the_game:
I never expected my life to change this fast. It feels like just yesterday that I started streaming, just an ordinary girl trying to find her place in the world. Now, at such a young age, people call me the queen of horror streamers—not just in my own country, but even overseas. Honestly, it all feels strange. My face appearing on screens, and my way of telling scary stories, has managed to capture the attention of millions who crave fear.

Day after day, I’m always searching for new content, always thinking about what I should do next. Every time I turn on the camera, I know they’re waiting. They want fear. And me? I’m always ready to deliver. But behind it all, there are things that are starting to feel heavy. The longer I stay here, the more I feel that something around me is changing.

Since the start of my career as a horror streamer in 2019, everything has always been normal. But lately, there’s something I can no longer ignore. The room where I work has started to feel strange. Too quiet, too cold, as if there’s tension in the air. Sometimes, I feel like I’m being watched, as if something is waiting just beyond my sight, always lurking. Shadows at the corner of my eyes, an unease that’s becoming more real. This isn’t just tension with the people around me, but something darker, something unseen yet always present, ready to strike at any moment.

Am I just imagining things, or is there something deeper behind all of this? I feel like it’s time to discover the truth lurking in this darkness. What’s really happening to me? Join me—I want to understand all these fears. Let’s dive into the darkness that threatens, and uncover the answers that have been hidden all along. Only we can reveal what’s waiting behind the screen, and perhaps, find our true selves.

Dara                : "Wait a minute, who am I talking to?"

Khodam: The Contract Demo is a True FPS Psychological Horror game inspired by Indonesian folklore about the protective figure "Khodam." It offers an immersive experience with a haunting atmosphere and highly realistic graphics. With detailed sound projection, graphics, and entities, the game makes you feel as if you’re truly inside it.

Here’s what makes Khodam: The Contract DEMO stand out:

  • Culturally Rich Horror: Experience the unsettling Indonesian myth of the Khodam.

  • Streamer Simulator: Play as Dara and feel like a real-life streamer, exploring her world through a computer UI and apps that closely resemble Windows OS.

  • Psychological Depth: Follow Dara as her actions and decisions shape her personality throughout the game.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Dynamic sound and lighting that pull players into a deeply haunting world.

  • Exploration of Digital Space: There’s a lot to explore, especially on Dara's computer, which adds depth to her streaming life and makes the experience more lifelike.

In this game, you can do whatever you want and shape Dara’s character however you like. The game includes multiple features that support the story's development. While there is one main storyline, every action and choice you make brings karmic consequences (Pamali).

This demo is a sequel to the main story in Khodam: The Contract Full Version. Make sure to play the demo first to fully understand the narrative we’ve crafted.

And remember, "There is no Dara in the real world—only you!"

movies.name: Khodam: The Contract DEMO First Trailer

name: Khodam: The Contract Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (Zen) / Intel Core i5-6400 (Skylake) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 16 Series with 4GB VRAM or Radeon RX 580 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Playing on minimum requirements should enable you to play at Low/Medium settings in Full HD (1080p) with a stable 30 FPS. SSD is recommended for faster load times and smoother gameplay. Make sure your FPS stays above 15 to prevent bugs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (Zen+) / Intel Core i7-6700K (Skylake) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 20 series with 6 GB VRAM / Radeon RX 6600 XT with 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For optimal performance, set graphics to High or Cinematic in Full HD (1080p) or higher, ensuring a stable FPS of up to 60. A fast SSD is highly recommended for seamless gameplay. Your GPU should meet or exceed recommended specs, and turn on Ray Tracing for the most immersive experience.

short_description: Khodam: The Contract Demo is a True First-Person Psychological Horror game where something unseen always watches from the shadows. Play as Dara, a horror streamer, as you uncover dark secrets and face a force waiting to take control.
